# BNNSGraph.Builder.PoolingFunction.l2Norm

**Case**

A function for pooling that computes the square root of the sum of squares of each element in the pooling kernel.

## Declaration

```swift
case l2Norm
```
title: BNNSGraph.Builder.PoolingFunction.l2Norm
